humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are 5 lymph nodes examined, and 1 out of 2 lymph nodes in sentinel lymph node #2 are positive for metastatic carcinoma. This corresponds to the N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system, as per New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because one out of the two sentinel lymph nodes examined has metastatic carcinoma (1/2) with a metastatic focus measuring 1 cm and extracapsular extension is identified.
